remove a specific amount of CO2 is subject to a wildfire, the emissions captured in the trees are
reversed.’
Annex II Acronyms and Glossary of Terms: ‘Carbon credit – A transferable or tradable instrument
that represents one metric tonne of CO2eq emission reduction or removal issued and verified
according to recognised quality standards.’
